Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 130th/Avenue O
ShortDescription: Northbound 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Baltimore. 134th and Avenue O: due to, street blockage near 130th/Avenue O.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound  #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Baltimore. 134th and Avenue O: due to, street blockage near 130th/Avenue O.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Northbound Reroute near King Drive/31st
ShortDescription: Northbound 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 31st, Michigan and 25th: due to,street blockage near King Drive/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 31st, Michigan and 25th, including the normal route streets at the beginning and end, due to street blockage near King Drive/31st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
